subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Jess Jackson and his four partners must decide whether to retire Curlin, who  captured the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic, or race him next year as a 4-year-old.
snippet: Jess Jackson and his four partners must decide whether to retire Curlin, who  captured the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic, or race him next year as a 4-year-old.
